comment.author: 97609500@N00
comment._content: All I know of Michael Collins is from the movie of the same name.  I really need to dig a little deeper into Irish history.  Thanks for making these photos available on flickr!

comment.author: 47290943@N03
comment._content: You're more than welcome, Ken! Keep an eye out during July - many of our pics of the day will be Irish Civil War era, from our Hogan Collection...
comment.authorname: National Library of Ireland on The Commons

comment.author: 93609587@N07
comment._content: My Grandfather, Rupert Penny and his Fiance, Florence Bigger were married in Dublin on the day Michael Collins was shot.

comment.author: 47290943@N03
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/93609587@N07] Did they honeymoon in Dublin too, Sheila? I think honeymoons were only of a few days' duration back then, but if they did, then it must have been very strange with the thousands of people that attended the funeral in Dublin...
comment.authorname: National Library of Ireland on The Commons
